songs.title: Podcast-Clip-4.wav
songs.lyrics:
[Spoken: Andy Mineo, Delgis Mustafa, & Marcus Hollinger]
Right, I think as human we like boxes, yeah
It helps us understand the world quicker. um-hmm
It's like, "If I can just put you in this box than I can understand things." And uh, ya know that's always been something that we've fought against, like is to break out of boxes because people are not homogeneous, they don't all think the same, they don't all have the exact same, um, workings of peopl- of someone who might look like them, and so to unbox the world is to make it a lot less controlled, yeah, and I think we love control, we love ta-to think we're in control at least, and be, "oh, I understand these people, I can see through this." And, yeah, you don't leave room for people to be complex and to be unique, and um, I think if you're willing to box other people like that, that quickly you're probably not doing even work in yourself to understand who you are, 100 percent
